channel.title: Crashing :(
channel.description:
Anyone Help Me With My Crashing Problem Please
Everytime i trade an npc or try to use a fishing spot my server disconnects me then re connects
i looked on my run and it said this
[code][client-1-cory try man]: Loading finished. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -78 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:18223) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16995) at client.packetSending(client.java:16948) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player cory try man ClientHandler: Client cory try man disconnected. [/code]
Anyone ??
